TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ToolboxDataAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ToolboxDataAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ToolboxDataAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定當自訂控制項從工具 (例如 Microsoft Visual Studio) 內的工具箱拖曳出來時，為此自訂控制項產生的預設標記。

span.span: Specifies the default tag generated for a custom control when it is dragged from a toolbox in a tool such as Microsoft Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，Visual Studio 中，這類工具的視覺化設計工具會建立空白標記。By default, the visual designer of a tool such as Visual Studio, creates an empty tag. 這是控制項從 [工具箱] 拖曳至設計介面的視覺化設計工具卸除時，表示處於預設狀態中，控制項的標記。This is a tag representing a control in its default state, when the control is dropped from the toolbox of a visual designer onto the design surface. 若要指定初始的預設值，讓控制項可以使用這個屬性。To specify initial default values, a control can make use of this attribute. 若要自訂初始的 HTML 內容放在設計工具拖曳至控制項從 [工具箱] 拖曳至表單時，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this attribute to customize the initial HTML content that is placed in the designer when the control is dragged from the toolbox onto the form. ## Examples ``` [ ToolboxData("<{0}:MyLabel runat= server Text= MyLabel><{0}:MyLabel>") ]public class MyLabel : Label {...} ``` 在下列程式碼範例中，先前的程式碼會設定數個屬性特有`MyLabel`。In the following code example, the previous code sets several properties specific to `MyLabel`. 所有出現的`{0}`取代為設計工具中，與相關聯的標記前置詞`MyLabel`類別。All occurrences of `{0}` are replaced, by the designer, with the tag prefix associated with the `MyLabel` class. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ToolboxDataAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ToolboxDataAttribute/CS/toolboxdataattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ToolboxDataAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ToolboxDataAttribute/VB/toolboxdataattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得字串，表示控制項屬性的初始值，這個字串會在視覺化設計工具中用來建立控制項的執行個體。

span.span: Gets the string representing the initial values of the control's property, which is used in a visual designer for creating an instance of the control.

value.span: 表示這個屬性初始值的字串。

span.span: A string representing the initial values for this attribute.

summary.span: 表示自訂控制項的預設 值。

span.span: Represents the default value for a custom control.

summary.span: 測試 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Tests whether the object is equal to the given object.

returns.span: 如果 物件等於指定的物件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the object is equal to the given object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先比較的物件是否相等。The method first compares the objects for equality. 如果比較傳回`false`、方法接著會比較資料的之後第一個測試指定的物件，並確定指定的物件不是指定之物件的資料物件`null`和也型別為物件。If the comparison returns `false`, the method then compares the data of the object to the data of the given object after first testing the given object to make sure that the given object is not `null` and is also typed as object.

span.span: , if the contains the default value for the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設為空字串 ("")。The default is an empty string ("").
